**Tender Announcement: Portable Laser Testing System**
=====================================================

**Title:** One (1) Portable Laser Testing System
**Reference Number:** cb-139-15683728
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249126/A

**Publication Date:** October 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 14, 2023, 14:00 (EST)

**Opportunity Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Contracting Authority:** Department of National Defence
**Contact Information:**

* Name: Martin Verrier
* Email: [martin.verrier@forces.gc.ca](mailto:martin.verrier@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 598-6884

**Overview:**

The Department of National Defence, through the Quality Engineering Test Establishment (QETE), is soliciting proposals for the procurement of one (1) Portable Laser Testing System (PLTS). The system will be used to support projects requiring on-site and in-house laser safety testing.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful proponent shall deliver the following equipment:

* Optical head
* Oscilloscope
* Workstation
* Control and analysis software
* Accessories

The proponent shall also provide onsite training for QETE technical personnel.

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation is open to all qualified bidders, subject to the applicable trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others. Please refer to the solicitation documents for a complete list.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Attachments:**

The solicitation documents, including the RFP, can be found at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22868/w8486-249126_request_for_proposal_amd_002_eng.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22868/w8486-249126_demande_de_proposition_amd_001_fr.pdf

Please note that the tender has expired, and only inspection and documentation are expected from bidders. However, a list of documents are attached at the bottom for future reference purposes.
